msItem.title: Divan of Najib al-Din
In the colophon the work is given the title Diwan Najib al-Din,
msItem.note: Probably written by Najib al-Din Jurbadaqani. To check. First half of the initial opening missing. Ruled margins and dividing panels. One half of illuminated initial opening survives. Paper tinted various colours. In the colophon the work is given the title Diwan Najib al-Din,
msItem.incipit: ... Dadah qada zi qurs-i khur u tir-i mah kam

layoutDesc.p: 14 lines to the page in double column

bindingDesc.p: Recent brown morocco European binding with flap. Held in blue card case with a slot holding the previous paper cover and samples of materials removed in the repairs and used for them.

acquisition.p: Given by 'a subscriber, as noted in the Donations Register for 18 May 1833. Omitted from Morley's list of donors. There is nothing obvious on the MS itself.

availability.p: Visitors are welcome to consult manuscripts in the library by prior appointment. Information on access is available on the library page of the Society's web site at www.royalasiaticsociety.org and appointments can be arranged by e-mailing library@royalasiaticsociety.org
